examData.instruction:
In this part, I'm going to ask you three short questions about yourself and your interests. You will have 30 seconds to reply to each question. 
Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

question.text: Please tell me about your family.
Tell me about your hometown/ the place that you live?/ Tell me about a famous place in your country?

examData.instruction:
In this part, I'm going to ask you to describe a picture. Then I will ask you two questions about it. You will have 45 seconds for each response. 
Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

question.text: Do you like traveling by train?
Why do people prefer traveling by plane to by train?

examData.instruction:
In this part, I'm going to ask you to compare two pictures, and I will then ask you two questions about them. You will have 45 questiosn for each response. 
Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

question.text: Why do people like visiting peaceful places on their holiday?

examData.instruction: In this part, I'm going to show you a picture and ask you three questions. You will have one minute to think about your answers before you start speaking. You will have two minutes to answer all three questions. Begin speaking when you hear this sound.

question.text:
Look at the photograph. 
You now have one minute to think about your answers. You can make notes if you wish. 
Tell me about a time when you were on your own. 
How did you feel about it?
What are some of the ways of passing the time on your own?

teacherComments.0: Small family có thể thay bằng nuclear family (gia đình hạt nhân)
teacherComments.1: Từ new things phần end sound cần rõ ràng hơn em nhé.
teacherComments.2: Từ comfortable cần đọc như sau: https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/definition/english/comfortable?q=comfortable+
teacherComments.3: Good. Nhấn nhá ngắt câu tốt hơn một xíu là oke.
teacherComments.4: Từ scenery nói rõ ra nhé: https://www.oxfordlearnersdictionaries.com/definition/english/scenery?q=Scenery
teacherComments.5: and entertainment activities nhé, đang bị thiếu em ạ.
teacherComments.6: phần kết luận mà không đủ thời gian thì em có thể nói ngắn hơn một chút em nhé. The pictures highlight the different atmospheres of living.
teacherComments.7: reducing stress and enjoying the fresh atmosphere cho dài em nhé.
teacherComments.8: enjoy the nature em nhé, natural là tính từ thì phải thêm danh từ ở đằng sau.
teacherComments.9:
Các ý có thể dùng để nói câu 3 em này: 
Listening to music – It helps me relax and feel happy.
(Nghe nhạc – Nó giúp tôi thư giãn và cảm thấy vui vẻ.)

Watching movies or videos – I enjoy learning and having fun at the same time.
(Xem phim hoặc video – Tôi vừa học được điều mới vừa giải trí.)

Reading a book – It’s a good way to improve my knowledge.
(Đọc sách – Đây là cách tốt để nâng cao kiến thức.)

Going for a walk – It helps me stay healthy and think clearly.
(Đi dạo – Nó giúp tôi khỏe mạnh và suy nghĩ rõ ràng hơn.)

Writing in a notebook or drawing – I can express my ideas and feelings.
(Viết vào sổ hoặc vẽ – Tôi có thể thể hiện ý tưởng và cảm xúc của mình.)
